center.type_boost_all: Increases all substats (Da, Vo, Pf) of all {{attribute}} cards by {{percent}}%
center.all_boost: Increases all stats of all card types by {{percent}}%. For songs of type "All", this is increased by {{percent2}}%

live.type_1: Increases the score by {{percent}}% for {{duration}} seconds.
live.type_2: Increases the score of Flick notes by {{percent}}% for {{duration}} seconds and for other notes by {{percent2}}%.
live.type_3: Increases the score of Long and Slide notes by {{percent}}% for {{duration}} seconds and for other notes by {{percent2}}%.

support.type_1: Decreases the amount that Voltage lowers after a Bad/Miss.
support.type_4: Increases the amount that the Ensemble Time Gauge rises after a Good/Great/Perfect.
support.type_29: During Ensemble Live: Increases the drop rate of all Stat Pieces by {{percent}}%
support.type_30: Increases the drop rate of Idol Pieces by {{percent}}%.
support.type_generic: Increases the drop rate of {{type}} stat pieces by {{percent}}%.
